title: What are some common mistakes made by most beginning authors and how do you correct them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Misspelling. I corecct their spellingWord usage: If a word is used incorrectly, I offer a better oneHoles in story, I point them outUndeveloped characters: I point them out and offer advice to the best of my ability. This is a problem for me also, so I wouldn’t advise anyone to take my words as GospelThe work is dull. I show ways to liven it up
